name: Tainted Space
description:
Something terrible happened on your space station. Some force has possessed almost the entire crew. Fight your way to the escape pod to survive and while you're at it, kill as many of those demon bastards as you can!

Credits
  • Fabian Fuchs - That awesome zombie!
  • Andrey Sitkov - Those kick-ass riffs!
  • Kenney - The magnificent particle effects!
